article:
My class is like   a big _ . I like all my _ . I have many friends in my class. One of them is Suzy, a girl from Nanjing. But now she lives _ Yangzhou.
Suzy is a good student. She learns   all her _ well. Her favourite thing is _ . She thinks books are like food and help her _ lot.
 _ Wednesday afternoons, she always _ to a nursing house  . Sometimes she _ with the old people there. Sometime she plays some music for them. They enjoy listening to Beijing Opera   very much.
Suzy is also a good _ . She thinks Yang Liping is one of the best dancers in the world. So she often watches Yang's shows on TV. Her great dream _ to see Yang Liping, though  she knows it is _ .
